DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine risk factor osteonecrosis jaw ( ONJ ) , include possible association bisphosphonates ( BPs ) . This study use research infrastructure three NIDCR-funded dental practice-based research network ( DPBRN , PEARL , PRECEDENT ) . De-identified data DPBRN merge comparable de-identified data PEARL PRECEDENT form single trans-PBRN data set use analysis .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study ( 1 ) test hypothesis ( BP ) treatment risk factor ( ONJ ) ; ( 2 ) test hypothesis dental disease ( particularly periodontal disease ) , invasive dental procedure dental extraction true risk factor ( ONJ ) .
DOC.criteria: participant directly involve study patient dentists dental practice base research network ( DPBRN , PEARL , PRECEDENT ) . participant history sickle cell anemia participant history external severe trauma jaw
